channel.title: Npc's
channel.description:
So basically I have really terrible graphics for my npc's and I would eventually want to have those updated to more realistic looks rather than a flat 3d look.
I'm just wondering if I would have to add like, eg: 525 graphics? Or 525 npc's?

item.title: Npc's
item.dc:creator: @wildskiller wildskiller
item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

[quote=“u loose, post:1, topic:523718”]So basically I have really terrible graphics for my npc’s and I would eventually want to have those updated to more realistic looks rather than a flat 3d look.

I’m just wondering if I would have to add like, eg: 525 graphics? Or 525 npc’s?[/quote]
You could just upgrade to a higher revision instead. The older servers with new items make the servers ugly and unattractive.

Read full topic
